task_summary: Robot arm pours contents from a cup into a mug, following a sequence of detection, approach, pouring, and retreat steps based on visual confirmation.

task_long_description.overview: This episode depicts a SARA robot arm executing a pouring task: transferring the contents of a cup into a mug placed on a tabletop. The arm locates and approaches the mug, aligns a grasped cup above it, performs a controlled tilt to pour, and finally retracts, ensuring the mug is properly targeted and avoiding spillage. Visual verification is used before pouring; pouring parameters are inferred from the scene.
preconditions: Cup held securely by robot gripper
Mug visible and accessible on table
No obstructions or foreign objects near mug
stepwise_plan: Verify mug visibility; re-scan if needed
Move cup above mug at pouring offset
Pour from cup into mug with controlled tilt
success_criteria: Robot arm retreats to safe distance
failure_and_recovery: If mug not visible, retry scans up to 3 times
If pour incomplete, retry Pour if possible
task_long_description.termination: Tree terminates after retreat; episode ends when robot safely returns post-pour.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: True if mug is visible in the workspace
Actively scans for mug in raster pattern, up to 3 attempts
Move robot's held cup above mug at safe pouring offset
Pour cup contents into mug at 45Â° tilt; rate inferred visually

failure_modes: Arm fails to align above mug
recovery_strategy: Up to three visual rescan attempts
Replan above-mug approach if obstacle detected
Abort pour if mug not confirmed
Retreat and signal if spillage detected
assumptions: The cup is already grasped by the robot at start; not part of detected steps
Pour parameters (amount, rate) not visible in frames; inferred as 'normal'
If instruction implied grasping, but not shown, action excluded per frame evidence

expected_success_criteria: Cup contents fully transferred into mug
